definition: "Daher" is an adverb that is commonly used to indicate the reason or cause behind a particular action, event, or situation. It is often employed to express the consequence or result of a preceding statement or circumstance.

examples.german: Daher gehe ich nicht zur Party.
examples.english: Therefore, I am not going to the party.

examples.german: Er ist krank, daher kann er nicht arbeiten.
examples.english: He is sick, so he cannot work.

examples.german: Das Auto ist alt, daher ist es nicht mehr sicher.
examples.english: The car is old, hence it is no longer safe.

examples.german: Sie hat viel gelernt, daher besteht sie die Pr√ºfung.
examples.english: She has studied a lot, therefore she passes the exam.
